metadata.title: USN-4613-1 -- python-cryptography vulnerability
metadata.description: Hubert Kario discovered that python-cryptography incorrectly handled certain decryption. An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4613-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-cryptography - 2.8-3ubuntu0.1 python-cryptography - 2.8-3ubuntu0.1 python-cryptography-doc - 2.8-3ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
